text: Tuhanku Droeneuh ka Neubri keu lon P Lon mat keurajeun bak nanggroe luah ” Lagi pih keu lon ka Neupeureunoe Taʻbi dum leumpoe ka jeut lonpeugah Droeneuh nyang peujeut langet ngon bumoe Wali lon sinoe masa nyang sudah Droeneuh wali lon donya akhirat Mate lon meuhat bek roh lam salah Neubri mate lon dalam Islam Meusapat sajan ureueng meutuah Ngon ureueng saleh Neubri beusapat Wahe Hadharat nyang Maha Murah
